melodymod:RhythmPower.NAME: Rhythm
DESCRIPTIONS: Enables Tempo cards. Decays by half each turn.

melodymod:StepPower.NAME: Step
DESCRIPTIONS: The number of steps since you started dancing.

melodymod:DancePower.NAME: Dance
DESCRIPTIONS: The next card played is free if it is a Dance of lower value.

melodymod:RefrainPower.NAME: Refrain
DESCRIPTIONS: Rhythm at the start of your turn.
